div.bibl: Svenska Tribunen, February 24, 1892SWEDISH LODGE CELEBRATES TWENTIETH BIRTHDAY.

body.p: The twentieth anniversary of its founding was celebrated last Sunday by the First Swedish Lodge of the Independent Order of Odd Fellows by a banquet and ball at Brands' Hall, corner of Clark and Erie Sts. Nerdstjernan Music Band furnished the music. The affair was attended by between 800 and 900 members and their guests.
